bioconda.name: rnalien
bioconda.summary: A tool for unsupervised construction of RNA family models

biocontainers.name: rnalien
biocontainers.summary: A tool for unsupervised construction of rna family models

biotools.summary: RNAlien is a tool for automatic construction of RNA family models from a single sequence. Results include a covariance model, structural alignment and consensus secondary structure.

bioschemas.name: RNAlien
bioschemas.summary: RNAlien is a tool for automatic construction of RNA family models from a single sequence. Results include a covariance model, structural alignment and consensus secondary structure.
